title: If you eat mermaid flesh you turn immortal so why doesnt chogath eat nami turn invulnerable
body:
Legend has it that mermaid flesh consumed makes you immortal so why doesmt chogath get a taric ult when he eats nami.


is it because nami is just HALF FISH and not really a Mermaid after all???


My source of information is In/Spectre
